name: The Residents' Bad Day on the Midway
name_original: The Residents' Bad Day on the Midway
description:
The Residents' Bad Day on the Midway is an adventure game developed by The Residents and Cryptic Corporation, The. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Inscape.
The Residents' Bad Day on the Midway is available on PC.
